pylayers.signal.bsignal.TUsignal.psd¶

TUsignal.psd(Tpns=100, R=50)[source]¶

calculate power spectral density

Parameters :

R : Resistance (default 50 Ohms)

Tpns : PRP

.. note:: :

If the Time is expressed in ns the resulting PSD is expressed in dBm/MHz (~10-9)
